column4: when the time comes that I'm ready to dedicate a larger part of the hard drive to Ubuntu, would I be better off just blowing away the present partitions and starting over with a new install?
I just did a complete reinstall of ubuntu, and I'm noticing that I can't access some of the packages that I could previously, but as far as I can tell, I have all the available sources selected
ok, so there'd be no particular need to go in and manually edit the source file?
